```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

data("instacart")
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
instacart %>%
  group_by(user_id, department) %>% 
  filter(department %in% c("alcohol", "personal care", "breakfast")) %>% 
  summarise(
    avg_days_between_order = mean(days_since_prior_order), 
    avg_items = mean(add_to_cart_order), 
    num_orders = max(order_number)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(text_label = str_c("User ID: ", user_id, '\nDepartment: ', department, "\nAvg Days Between Orders: ", avg_days_between_order)) %>% 
  #rename("average items per order" = avg_items, "total number of orders" = num_orders) %>%  
  plot_ly(
    x = ~num_orders, y = ~avg_items, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~department, text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.5)
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  filter(department %in% c("alcohol",  "breakfast", "personal care")) %>%
  plot_ly(y = ~add_to_cart_order, color = ~department, type = "box")
```

### Chart C

```{r}
instacart %>% filter(department %in% c("alcohol",  "breakfast", "personal care")) %>%
  group_by(department, order_dow) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(department) %>% 
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n)) %>%
  mutate(
    order_dow = fct_relevel(factor(order_dow), c("0", "1", "2", "3", "4", "5", "6")),
    order_dow = recode(order_dow, '0' = "Monday", '1' = "Tuesday", '2'="Wednesday",      '3'="Thursday", '4'="Friday", '5'="Saturday", '6'="Sunday"), 
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_dow, y = ~prop, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines',
    color = ~department)
```
